divs: Sighting Detailsit was about 700 o'clock i just stepped out on my front porch and noticed a bright oval shaped orb or fireball flying very fast but it was stationary until i noticed it over my house then it took of flying north at what had to be over 100 miles per hour this thing covered an entire neighborhood in secs i manged to get some very poor pictures of it i could see it better with my naked eye it was about a 70 to 80 degrees up in the sky it was flying in between clouds i know that because at times when it was blasting off it would disappear behind a cloud then it would fly in front of another one the strangest thing to me is that it seemed to be watching me and was stationary tell i noticed it
Summary: a bright oval shaped orb or fireball
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around October 9th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
